metadata.Title: CVE-2023-26150 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Versions of the package asyncua before 0.9.96 are vulnerable to ImproperAuthentication such that it is possible to access Address Space withoutencryption and authentication. **Note:** This issue is a result of missingchecks for services that require an active session.

criterions.comment: python-opcua: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
